content: Just a quick ping regarding #14542 . It has been sitting for a while, and it's blocking some of @Michael Blyth 's other upcoming PRs
Looks like it has a merge conflict?
Yeah I see it now, but the label isn't there! Strange
Yeah I've seen other examples of that label failing to appear recently :shrug:‍♂️
Yeah we turned off the merge conflict bot a month or so ago because it was exceeding the token threshold (if I'm remembering correctly? another maintainer will know).
